title: Potion card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a long-unvisited wine rack, with each bottle's label coated in dust.}} The potion card gives the effect of a potion to you and any allies in [[line of sight]]. The potion selected is determined as follows: * Power level 0: Select a potion effect from this list: **[[Potion of curing]] (37.5%) **[[Potion of agility]] (12.5%) **[[Potion of brilliance]] (12.5%) **[[Potion of might]] (12.5%) **[[Potion of berserk rage]] (12.5%) **[[Potion of invisibility]] (12.5%) * Power level 1: Two equally probable possibilities: ** [[potion of resistance]] ** [[potion of haste]] * Power level 2: Two equally probable possibilities: ** [[potion of heal wounds]] ** [[potion of magic]] [[Cheibriados]] blocks haste and berserk effects, wasting the card, but worshippers do not lose [[piety]].
